page.title: 03Worship in Enfield
page.content: The 5 main churches in Enfield town are: The Church of England, Baptist, Evangelical, Methodist, & Roman Catholic. The C. of E. is the oldest, one part is 795 years old. During the 2nd World War, the Evangelical Church was bombed so the building is newer. The C. of E. has the most Sunday Services, 5. Most of the others have between 2 & 4. The age range of Sunday School is 3 - 21 years. All the churches said that over the last 10 years their congregations had increased, so had Baptisms, Dedications, Confirmations & Weddings. Nearly all hold joint services with other denominations. We did a survey in Enfield. We asked 140 people if they went to chuch, 50% said no, 25% said yes, 25% said sometimes.
